verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees.<s%> <S%H7227>Many<s%> a <S%H7227>time<s%> have they <S%H6887>afflicted<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth,<s%> may <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H559>say:<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> a <S%H7227>time<s%> have they <S%H6887>afflicted<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth:<s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> they have not <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> against me.
The <S%H2790>plowers<s%> <S%H2790>plowed<s%> on my <S%H1354>back:<s%> they made <S%H748>long<s%> their <S%H4618>furrows.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> he has <S%H7112>cut<s%> asunder the <S%H5688>cords<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
Let them be as the <S%H2682>grass<s%> on the <S%H1406>housetops,<s%> which <S%H3001>wither<s%> <S%H6924>before<s%> it <S%H8025>grows<s%> up:
With which the <S%H7114>mower<s%> <S%H4390>fills<s%> not his <S%H3709>hand;<s%> nor he that <S%H6014>binds<s%> <S%H485>sheaves<s%> his <S%H2683>bosom.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> do they which <S%H5674>go<s%> by <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be on you: we <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
